about_the_game:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA Shinovi Versus in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

Tracklist:
1. Bouncing on the Beach!
2. Proof of Strength
3. The Path of Challenges
4. Snowy Mountain Climb
5. The Shinobi Principle
6. At Hanzō Academy
7. At Hebijo Academy
8. Shop District Rampage
9. Shopping
10. Successor of Hanzō
11. Sprouts of Fire
12. For Master Kurokage
13. For Your Scar
14. Super Duper Masochism
detailed_description:
This music pack allows you to use music from SENRAN KAGURA Shinovi Versus in SENRAN KAGURA Peach Ball.

At the Stage Select screen on Story Mode or Free Mode, use the "BGM" option to change the gameplay music.

Tracklist:
1. Bouncing on the Beach!
